resources.string: Translated into English from:\nMuhammad Habib Shakir
Translated into German from:\nAdel Theodor Khoury
All translated data are from website \nhttp://qurandatabase.org\nWe apologize if there are any errors.
In the name of All-llah the most Beneficent the most Merciful
Are you sure you want to exit?
Swipe right to go to previous page
Swipe left to go to next page

The purpose of this application is to help people who are interested in understanding Qur'an, explanations and interpretations of rules, surahs and topics about life in Qur'an.

In each windows there can be more than one page, so please swipe your finger to check if there are more pages.

Usage
In Main menu are 4 buttons: categories, search, reading Qur'an in English language, reading Qur'an in Arabic language with latin words.

Categories:
On this page we show a series of topics that Qur'an talks about. After clicking to the topic that you are interested in it will open a new page where there will be all of ayahs that are talking about that topic. To change the pages you will need only to swipe your finger to the sides.

Search:
On this page there is a text field where you need to type the words you are interested and then we will show a series of topics that match the search. After clicking to the topic that you are interested in it will open a new page where there will be all of ayahs that are talking about that topic. To change the pages you will need only to swipe your finger to the sides.

Reading Qur'an in English language:
On this page you can read Qur'an, first you need to choose the surah you are interested, after selecting the surah you will need to choose the ayah number then the application will highlight the selected ayah. To change the pages you will need only to swipe your finger to the sides.

Reading Qur'an in Arabic language with latin words:
On this page you can read Qur'an, first you need to choose the surah you are interested, after selecting the surah you will need to choose the ayah number then the application will highlight the selected ayah. To change the pages you will need only to swipe your finger to the sides.
